Rows.Name: NW Test Room
Rows.Desc: Sterile, bland room with boring, off-white paint job and tile flooring.  You feel like a lab rat in here.  There is a small, rusty metal desk with an old office chair here.  On the desk is a disorganized pile of paper forms, with unsharpened pencils littered about.  Whoever occupies this work area could use a change of career.

Rows.Name: NE Test Room
Rows.Desc: Sterile, bland room with boring, off-white paint job and tile flooring.  You feel like a lab rat in here.  There is a south door, but it is barred with a heavy padlock.

Rows.Name: SW Test Room
Rows.Desc: Sterile, bland room with boring, off-white paint job and tile flooring.  You feel like a lab rat in here.

Rows.Name: SE Test Room
Rows.Desc: Sterile, bland room with boring, off-white paint job and tile flooring.  You feel like a lab rat in here.  There is a small window looking outside, but it is gray and cloudy.  There is a north door, but it is barred with a heavy padlock.
